Module oop.snake
Package ru.nsu.fit.oop.melnikov.game.snake.model.field

Class Field

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.oop.melnikov.game.snake.model.field.Field
public class Field extends Object
Field is an unmodifiable set of cells where snake is going to move.

  • Method Details

    • isNoPlaceForApple

      public boolean isNoPlaceForApple()
      Shows if there are some spaces for apples to be placed.
      Returns:
      true if there is such a cell where apple can be places and false otherwise

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()

    • getCells

      public Cell[][] getCells()

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell(int x, int y)
      Returns cell with specified coordinates. Throws IndexOutOfBoundException if either x or y out of field size.
      Parameters:
      x - x cell coordinate
      y - y cell coordinate
      Returns:
      cell if such exists

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell(Point<Integer> intPoint)
      Delegates duties to getCell(int, int)
      Parameters:
      intPoint - point with specified x and y to search cell by them
      Returns:
      cell if such exists

    • applesCount

      public int applesCount()

    • regenerateApples

      public void regenerateApples(int appleCount)
      Clean all the existing apples and generate the specified count of new ones.
      Parameters:
      appleCount - count of apples to generate

    • generateApple

      public void generateApple()
      Generates new single apple in random place.

      Does nothing if there is no place for apple.

    • eatApple

      public void eatApple(Cell appleCell)
      Correctly removes apple from the field.
      Parameters:
      appleCell - cell where one of apples is located
